snippet: It has been one of those weeks for Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain. A string of embarrassing gaffes includes a growing furor over the government's tax assault on one of the country's favorite snacks.
abstract: It has been one of those weeks for Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain. A string of embarrassing gaffes includes a growing furor over the government's tax assault on one of the country's favorite snacks.

headline.main: Pasty-gate and a Series of 'Own Goals' Hit Cameron
